author: rgardler
msg: Use local-name() rather than name() so that attributes with a defined namespace are carried accross.
This may seem a little strange since it will strip the namespace from the attribute in the output document,
however, with name() the attribute is stripped completely so this is a step in the right direction. It is
needed to allow the Exhibit contract to work that is currently in development as part of the DOAP plugin.
If anyone knows how to do this in a better way (i.e. include the namespace in the output) please go ahead.
